import heapq

def min_cost_to_connect_ropes(ropes):
    heapq.heapify(ropes)
    cost = 0
    
    while len(ropes) > 1:
        new_rope = heapq.heappop(ropes) + heapq.heappop(ropes)
        cost += new_rope
        heapq.heappush(ropes, new_rope)
    
    return cost

ropes = [4, 3, 2, 6]
print(min_cost_to_connect_ropes(ropes))
prompt: Connect n ropes with minimum cost yaz.
